list.abs: 它能够完全抵御魔法飞弹的攻击,同时,给施法者带来+7的防护等级改善。 防护石化(Protection from petrification)(防护系)施法者等级:巫师/术士 1 范围:接触持续时间.

means.word_mean: 1. the process of turning some plant material into stone by infiltration with water carrying mineral particles without changing the original shape

auth_sentence.content: I see it as the result of rapid sedimentation and rapid petrification in layers that simply can't be millions of years old.
